coreAtributes.name: Breastplate
coreAtributes.description: A breastplate with an arcane symbol on the chest for protection.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull off your breastplate and drop it next to your feet.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull off [npc.name]'s breastplate and drop it at [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s breastplate and roughly pull it off [npc.her] before dropping it at [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls off [npc.her] breastplate and drops it next to [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls off your breastplate and drops it at your feet.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your breastplate and roughly pulls it off, before dropping it next to you.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls off [npc2.name]'s breastplate and drops it next to [npc2.her] feet.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s breastplate and roughly pulls it off, before dropping it at [npc2.her] feet.

replacementText.playerNPC: You pull the breastplate down onto [npc.her].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly pull the breastplate onto [npc.her].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls the breastplate down onto you.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly pulls the breastplate onto you.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] pulls the breastplate down over [npc2.name]'s head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pulls the breastplate onto [npc2.her].
